metadata.title: CVE-2019-20477

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 12

metadata.description: PyYAML 5.1 through 5.1.2 has insufficient restrictions on the load and load_all functions because of a class deserialization issue, e.g., Popen is a class in the subprocess module. NOTE: this issue exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2017-18342.
